languages.text: "Если ты прав, то почему мне чудится, что с Его губ вот-вот сорвется твое имя..."
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Pasqal: "Relying on the judgement of others was a mistake. They only curbed my potential. I will achieve more on my own! The Discontinuing does not tolerate doubt!"

languages.text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
languages.original_text: "Если ты прав, то почему мне чудится, что с Его губ вот-вот сорвется твое имя..."

traits.locale_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
"If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
"If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
"If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
"If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr recht habt, warum spüre ich dann, dass sein Name bald von seinen Lippen fliegen wird?"
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr recht habt, warum spüre ich dann, dass sein Name bald von seinen Lippen fliegen wird?"

languages.text: « Si vous dites vrai, alors pourquoi ai-je le pressentiment qu'Il est sur le point de prononcer votre nom ? »
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous dites vrai, alors pourquoi ai-je le pressentiment qu'Il est sur le point de prononcer votre nom ? »

languages.text: «Si lo que dice es cierto, ¿por qué tengo la sensación de que Él está a punto de pronunciar su nombre?».
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

traits.locale_text: «Si lo que dice es cierto, ¿por qué tengo la sensación de que Él está a punto de pronunciar su nombre?».

languages.text: 「もしお前が正しいのなら、なぜ私は、あなたの名前が主の唇から飛び出そうとしているのを感じるのだ？」
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

traits.locale_text: 「もしお前が正しいのなら、なぜ私は、あなたの名前が主の唇から飛び出そうとしているのを感じるのだ？」

languages.text: “如果你说得没错，那为什么我总觉得祂很快就要说出你的名字了呢？”
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你说得没错，那为什么我总觉得祂很快就要说出你的名字了呢？”

languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"

languages.text: "Haklıysan neden ismin, O'nun dudaklarından dökülmek üzereymiş gibi hissediyorum?"
languages.original_text: "If you are right, why do I sense that your name is about to fly from His lips?"
